short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays information about the XTRABYTES (XBY) cryptocurrency using the yobit, c-cex, cryptopia, and coinmarketcap APIs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Retrieves the latest market information about the XTRABYTES (XBY) cryptocurrency from the yobit.net, c-cex.com, cryptopia.co.nz, and coinmarketcap.com APIs.

•Information updated every 10 seconds
•Display price in either BTC, USD, GBP, EUR
•Includes Badge ticker so you can see the price without having to open the popup
